content.rendered:
Jeff Tikitau
Real Estate Cook Islands

We offer a wide range of dream properties, from oceanfront villas to secluded beachfront homes. We also have a number of investment opportunities available, including resorts, businesses, and vacant land.

Our mission

At Jeff Tikitau Real Estate, our mission is to make the dream of owning property in Rarotonga a reality. To this end, we are dedicated to connecting individuals with their perfect piece of paradise. We offer professional real estate services that prioritize integrity, transparency, and a commitment to fulfilling dreams.

We have a deep understanding of the Rarotonga real estate market. We know the islands inside and out, and we can help you find the perfect property for your needs and budget.

We are committed to providing our clients with the best possible service. We are honest and transparent, and we always put our clients’ interests first.

We are passionate about helping people achieve their dreams. We believe that owning property in Rarotonga is a life-changing experience, and we are committed to making that dream a reality for our clients

In short, we are more than just a real estate company. We are a team of professionals who are passionate about helping people find their perfect piece of paradise in Rarotonga.

Featured Cook Islands listings

View all our listings >
Reputable Restaurant
The ultimate dining experience, where culinary excellence meets tranquility
View Details >
Accommodation Retreat
A boutique property of 3 units and pool with central location
View Details >
Historic Culinary Landmark
Own a piece of culinary history with lodging options
View Details >
Profitable Business
Well-established business with minimum 10% ROI
View Details >
For Sellers

The first step to success is finding the right agent

sell with us
for buyers

Trusted real estate experts in the Cook Islands

buy with us
For Investors

Discover our latest business opportunities

learn more

hear our

customer testimonials

Jeff, Natalie and the whole team at Jeff Tikitau Real Estate were a joy to work with. They did a brilliant job of marketing our property and working with potential purchasers. They did a thoroughly professional job for us from start to finish. We always had complete confidence in them to act in a way that meant that the interests of us sellers and our potential buyers were always considered thoughtfully. Can't recommend highly enough. Our relationship with them started as clients but rapidly became as friends.
Dr Peter Huckle
Thank you so much to Natalie, Jeff and the team for helping us sell our business. These guys are professional, friendly, and extremely thorough. Nothing was too much trouble, and they were always there to offer advice and guide us through the sale process. They are a top-class team and delivered results under the most difficult of circumstances – a global pandemic! That is a true testament to this team of professionals. We would not hesitate to recommend JTREL. Meitaki for everything.
Geraldine Marson
I don't know where to start with our praise for this team of high achievers. We bought a business through them whilst living in Australia and we could not have gotten the process across the line without JT and his team. They went so far above and beyond in organising contracts, immigration, lawyers etc, organised our rental accommodation for us and again made it happen even before we left Australia. Jeff, Nat and the rest of the team were there every day for us and nothing was a problem for them. we cannot recommend the JT Team highly enough.
Sniff Of Adventure
I recently purchased a property through Jeff Tikitau Real Estate. Natalie was incredibly professional to deal with and kept me fully updated on progress. I had contact with most members of the JT Team, and now feel like part of the JT family. I would highly recommend Jeff Tikitau Real Estate.
Mel Comber
The team at Jeff Tikitau Real Estate Cook Islands provide a high level of excellence, professionalism and quality communication that continues to exceed my property management expectations. I highly recommend their services for anyone and everyone sourcing the need to reside or invest in the Cook Islands.
Kimitaunga
Brian and I have been working with Jeff, Natalie, and the real estate team for over two years, using both their rental management and real estate listing services. We can highly recommend them as their rental management division was spot on in keeping our biggest asset well managed and maintained. Jeff and Natalie have brought back excitement and fresh energy to real estate in the Cook Islands. They have the staff to guide you through a process that can bring your tropical dreams to life, it's easier than you think to own property, a business, and live in the Cook Islands. What are you waiting for?
Jon Beymer & Brian Paxton
Thank you so much to Jeff & Natalie for selling my business. I would highly recommend them to anyone considering selling in the Cook Islands. They are both very professional, great communicators & lovely to deal with. Jeff is very well connected locally and my property received a lot of interest internationally which shows that there is a good network world wide too. Natalie was very efficient keeping me up to date over emails and answering all my questions. And I know they worked so hard in a tough situation to sell my business.
Daisy Barclay-Economos
We were very pleased and most impressed with the highly professional approach taken by Jeff and Natalie Tikitau in acting as our agents. The promotion of our property was well planned and the consultation process at each step met our expectations. The end result was exactly as we had hoped.
Kurt & Tiana Meyer
Thanks to Nathalie & Jeff for helping us in the sale of our business. Professional international standards, good international exposure and fairly priced ! They were very professional, assisted us greatly and were transparent throughout the whole process ! Merci à Nathalie et Jeff pour leur aide dans la vente de notre fond de commerce ! Ils ont été professionnels, nous on bien aidé et ont été honnêtes jusqu’au bout du processus de vente !
Guillaume & Karine Kapfer
Jeff and Natalie Tikitau Real Estate came highly recommended. From day one, my experience with them has been first class all the way. Their expertise, high standards, professionalism, and reliability combined with their French and Pacific island charm are a big plus for the Cook Islands. They are the best in their field! Natalie’s professionalism, diligence, and great service as my agent has been superb! She is such a pleasure to work with! I highly recommend Jeff and Natalie Tikitau for all your property management and real estate needs.
Lady Carla Davis
Previous
Next

Looking to buy, sell or rent in the Cook Islands?

Our focus is to create the very best results for our clients through our innovative and energetic professional approach.

contact us
